name: The Forever Extending Hungry Snake
overview: This is a fun remake of the classic Snake game, which was written on theC64 full size. This game has a big twist to it. You are extending regardlessly. The object of this game is to help your Forever Extending Hungry Snake around the arena. During random time, yummy scrummy fruit will appear inside the arena. You job is to eat it and score as many points where possible. Unfortunately however, skulls will appear on screen. Avoid the skulls and the walls. Pick up bombs to clear the arena and shed all of your skin. Try to survive as long as you can before you are too late. There are no levels in this game, it is all about scoring points and having fun against each other.
